subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Francois Beauchemin, Corey Perry and Bobby Ryan scored during a 4-minute-23-second stretch of the third period, and the host Anaheim Ducks beat the St. Louis Blues, 4-2.
snippet: Francois Beauchemin, Corey Perry and Bobby Ryan scored during a 4-minute-23-second stretch of the third period, and the host Anaheim Ducks beat the St. Louis Blues, 4-2.
